oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-03-15 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 15, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hawkshaw Hawkins (host/performer), guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 962nd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Jean Shepard; Stringbean; Hawkshaw Hawkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hawkshaw Hawkins and Grant Turner introduce Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Jean Shepard -- Act Like A Married Man (Jean Shepard) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Stringbean -- Goodbye Liza Jane (Stringbean) -- Grant Turner introduces Hawkshaw Hawkins -- Guilty Of Dreaming (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner) -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
